ygData.subject: Re: Look Behind You Xiane, More Lacking of Honor!
ygData.msgSnippet: Zergling/Punch: Punch saw that Xiane was distracted, and took out his laser pistol from subspace.  He mentally cursed, a sword being his last weapon after this

Zergling/Punch:




Punch saw that Xiane was distracted, and took out his laser pistol 
from subspace.  He mentally cursed, a sword being his last weapon 
after this pistol.  He fired off two bolts at Xiane's back.

---

Zergling took aim with his rifle, taking a step back against a wall, 
wanting to get as far as he could so he didn't get cut in half.
